BiblioData.Title: Improved pigment spacing
BiblioData.Abstract: An improved pigment spacing composition) and method of manufacture. A coating composition wherein the pigment particles are spaced more uniformly resulting in improved coating properties. In another embodiment, the present invention relates to a composition having nanoparticles interacting with pigmentary titanium dioxide to provide for more uniform spacing of the titanium dioxide.

Claims.P: 1. A process for preparing a coating composition, comprising:
dispersing a plurality of titanium dioxide particles, pretreated with a metal oxide, with a dispersant in a first dispersion medium:
mixing a nanoparticle metal oxide pigment, pre-treated to minimize flocculation, and the first dispersion medium containing the titanium dioxide particles; and

interacting the nanoparticle pigment and the titanium dioxide particles to form an intervening dispersion of a plurality of nanoparticle pigment substantially uniformly distributed around the titanium dioxide particles.
2. The process of claim. 1, wherein the nanoparticle oxide pigment comprises zinc oxide.

3. The process of claim 1, wherein the step of dispersing the titanium dioxide particles in a first dispersion medium comprises using the dispersant which is selected from the group consisting of ammonia salt hydrophobic copolymer dispersant and high molecular weight block copolymer.

4. The process of claim 1, wherein the step of mixing the nanoparticle metal oxide pigment comprises mixing a first nanoparticle metal oxide pigment having a first average particle size and a second nanoparticle metal oxide pigment having a second average particle size, the first nanoparticle metal oxide pigment and the second nanoparticle metal oxide pigment having pro-treated surfaces to minimize flocculation.
5. The process of claim 4, wherein the first average particle size is about 120 nm and the second average particle size is about 60 nm.
6. The process of claim 4. wherein the first average particle size is about 120 nm and the second average particle size is about 50 nm.
7. A paint composition comprising:
a first pigment comprising titanium dioxide particles having an outer surface that has been pretreated with a metal oxide;
a first surface-treated nano pigment having a first average particle size;

a second surface-treated nano pigment having a second average particle size, the first nanoparticle metal oxide pigment and the second nanoparticle metal oxide pigment having pre-treated surfaces to minimize flocculation;
a dispersion medium; and
a binder;

wherein the first pigment, the first surface-treated nano pigment, and the second surface-treated nano pigment are substantially uniformly dispersed through a coating formed upon application of the paint composition to a substrate.
8. The paint composition of claim 7. wherein the nanoparticle mixed oxide pigment comprises zinc oxide.

9. The paint composition of claim 7, wherein the dispersion medium comprises a dispersant which is selected from the group consisting of ammonia salt, hydrophobic copolymer dispersant and high molecular weight block copolymer.
10. The paint composition of claim 7, wherein the first average particle size is about 120 nm and the second average particle size is about 60 nm.
11. The paint composition of claim 7, herein the first average particle size is about 120 nm and the second average particle size is about 50 nm.
